{"id":649066437,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1645856878,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/649066437/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Increasing Decreasing String","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string sortString(string s) {\n        vector<int> v(26);\n        int cnt = 0;\n        string ans = \"\";\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){\n            v[s[i]-'a']++;\n            if(v[s[i]-'a']==1){\n                cnt++;\n            }\n        }\n        while(cnt!=0){\n            for(int i=0;i<26;i++){\n                if(v[i]>0){\n                    v[i]--;\n                    if(v[i]==0){\n                        cnt--;\n                    }\n                    ans+=(char)(i+'a');\n                }\n            }\n            for(int i=25;i>=0;i--){\n                if(v[i]>0){\n                    v[i]--;\n                    if(v[i]==0){\n                        cnt--;\n                    }\n                    ans+=(char)(i+'a');\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"increasing-decreasing-string"}
